title: # 379 - Dan Soder & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Dan Soder to talk about our special tapings, being a hypochondriac, The Bonfire, cutting people out of your life, and much more!

Dan's new HBO special "Son of a Gary" is streaming now on HBO GO!

This episode is brought to you by Omax CBD. Go to www.omaxhealth.com and enter the promo code “Bert” for 20% off CryoFreeze pain relief roll on and site wide.

This episode is also brought to you by Policy Genius. If you need life insurance but haven’t gotten around to it, go to www.policygenius.com to get quotes and apply in minutes. 

This episode is also brought to you by Tushy. Get 10% off your order when you go to www.hellotushy.com/bert

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com To Follow me on.. Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
